title: Talisman

properties.name: description
properties.value: A talisman is an item used in the Runecraft skill, which are used to enter mysterious ruins to the corresponding runic altar. An earth talisman, for example, grants access to the Earth Altar. Talismans can be acquired from drops or by trading with other players.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Talisman
This article is about the talismans used for training Runecraft. For other uses, see Talisman (disambiguation).

A talisman is an item used in the Runecraft skill, which are used to enter mysterious ruins to the corresponding runic altar. An earth talisman, for example, grants access to the Earth Altar. Talismans can be acquired from drops or by trading with other players.

A talisman can be imbued onto a tiara, making it equippable and allowing players to left-click "Enter" the corresponding ruins, which saves an inventory space. All talismans can be bound in this way, though elemental and catalytic talismans require a gold tiara instead.

Talismans can be used to create combination runes and are consumed in the process.

Players using the Abyss to reach the altars do not require a talisman or tiara, nor is a talisman needed to access the Astral Altar.

Free to play[edit | edit source]

Lvl Talisman GE price Altar Main source(s)[n 1][n 2]
1 Air talisman 78
  • Collection without completing Rune Mysteries
  • Air wizard
  • Elaborate lockbox
  • Average Dorgesh-Kaan chest(m)
2 Mind talisman 1,390
  • Essence implings(m)
  • Imps
5 Water talisman 340
  • Dagannoth spawn(m)
  • Elaborate lockbox
  • Water wizard
  • Average Dorgesh-Kaan chest(m)
9 Earth talisman 272
  • Earth impling(m)
  • Elaborate lockbox
  • Earth wizard
  • Average Dorgesh-Kaan chest(m)
14 Fire talisman 2,068
  • Earth impling(m)
  • Fire wizard
  • Average Dorgesh-Kaan chest(m)
  • Elaborate lockbox
20 Body talisman 3,100
  • Ornate lockbox
  • Guard(f)
  1. ^ All talismans except blood and wrath talismans can also be received as a reward from the Guardians of the Rift Rewards Guardian
  2. ^ All standard talismans except wrath talismans can also be purchased with Abyssal pearls from the Guardians of the Rift Temple Supplies shop

2 Catalytic talisman 4,968



Rare drop from the Guardians of the Rift Rewards Guardian

  2. ^ All standard talismans except wrath talismans can also be purchased with Abyssal pearls from the Guardians of the Rift Temple Supplies shop
